[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@digitalpersona/services](./services.md) &gt; [IAdminService](./services.iadminservice.md) &gt; [SetServerSettings](./services.iadminservice.setserversettings.md)

## IAdminService.SetServerSettings() method

Modifies a list of settings on the DPCA Server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SetServerSettings(ticket: Ticket, type: ServerSettingType, settings: Attribute[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ticket | <code>Ticket</code> | a ticket with a JSON Web Token of the user who would like to modify server settings. The ticket owner has to have permissions to administer the server. |
|  type | <code>ServerSettingType</code> | a type of the settings |
|  settings | <code>Attribute[]</code> | a collection of settings to set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
